body_html: @apacha From my experiments I found CPU-optimized GPU TF doesn't boost the performance significantly, but it can make the CPU cooler. My processor's temperature often goes up to 80C during training, while the optimized TF usually keeps the temp. below 70C.
body_text: @apacha From my experiments I found CPU-optimized GPU TF doesn't boost the performance significantly, but it can make the CPU cooler. My processor's temperature often goes up to 80C during training, while the optimized TF usually keeps the temp. below 70C.
body: @apacha From my experiments I found CPU-optimized GPU TF doesn't boost the performance significantly, but it can make the CPU cooler. My processor's temperature often goes up to 80C during training, while the optimized TF usually keeps the temp. below 70C.
